name: WB_User
comments: idInjection - Whether to automatically add an id property to the model.  True by default.

acceptedTCTS.comments: Date of the last time the user accepted Terms and conditions.

settings.comments: User is allowed to activate/deactivate notifications, this needs to be kept as an entity by itself and probably stored in the MMW User settings component.
